An amateur photographer on the North Coast of New South Wales has turned the ordinary into the extraordinary by capturing a series of mesmerising photographs of Lake Cakora at Brooms Head.

articles.description: Cricket star Virat Kohli and Bollywood star Anushka Sharma have announced the birth of his daughter with the cricket world sharing its support for the superstar couple.
